event.title: shut down nearly 1,200 dairy farms last week

data.event: In an effort to clean up the dairy industry, the government shut down nearly 1,200 dairy farms last week.
The suspect is an independent dairy farmer who has sold homemade dairy products for many years, said a public official from the local government who requested to remain anonymous.

event.title: Friday press release from the city government and local health bureau, the 35 people who fell

data.event: According to a Friday press release from the city government and local health bureau, the 35 people who fell ill by consuming the milk are being treated in two hospitals in Pingliang.
In 2008, at least six infants died and nearly 300,000 others were sickened after consuming powdered infant milk laced with the chemical melamine.
